newsitem.title: USA: Tubby's plans expansion into Canada.
newsitem.headline: Tubby's plans expansion into Canada.

text.p: Tubby's Sub Shops Inc said Friday it will expand into Canada, with plans to open 30 Canadian stores over the next five years.
The specialty sandwich chain said its first Canadian store will open next month in Edmonton, followed by stores in Calgary and Vancouver.
Tubby's added that it is currently seeking additional development agents in connection with its plans for stores in other Canadian cities, including Toronto and Montreal.
Established in 1968, Tubby's has 80 sub shops located in Michigan, Ohio, Arizona, and Pennsylvania.
Tubby's is also the parent company for the Stuff Yer Face casual dining restaurants located in New Jersey.
